amendment.description: To provide that for purposes of the Federal purchase requirement, renewable energy includes thermal energy.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3145 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3145 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Carper to Amendment SA 2953.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3145 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3145 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Carper to Amendment SA 2953.
